page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: Many thousands of people use Stokes Bay for a number of different leisure pursuits. There are guide lines all along the coast for launching sailbords in several designated areas, access to both the slipways and car parks are easy. Swimmers too are catered for. But bathing is not advised within the sailboard areas and so parts of the beach have been designated for swimming only. There are numerous car parks and in the summer months Stokes Bay is very popular. There are several bus services which connect Stokes Bay to Gosport and Lee-on-Solent. In addition to swimming and sailing there are tennis courts,putting green,bowls and a childrens paddling pool.
